vampire.config_products.CHIRPSDatasetImpl module¶

CHIRPS data handling.

Provides classes for downloading and processing CHIRPS data.

class vampire.config_products.CHIRPSDatasetImpl.CHIRPSDatasetImpl(interval, product_date, vampire_defaults, region=None)[source]¶

Bases: vampire.config_products.RasterDatasetImpl.RasterDatasetImpl

CHIRPS data

Data handling for CHIRPS data

end_date¶

Get and set end date of dataset.

generate_config(data_dir=None, download=True, crop=True, crop_dir=None)[source]¶

Generate a config file process for the dataset.

Generate VAMPIRE config file process(es) for the dataset including download and crop if specified.

Parameters:
  • data_dir (string) – Path for downloaded data. The data will be stored in this path under a directory with the interval name. If the data_dir is None, the VAMPIRE default download directory will be used.
  • download (bool) – Flag indicating whether data should be downloaded. Default is True.
  • crop (bool) – Flag indicating whether data should be cropped to region. Default is True.
  • crop_dir (string) – Path where cropped data will be stored. If None, the region code will be appended to the download data path.
Returns:

string containing the configuration file process.
generate_header()[source]¶

Generate VAMPIRE config file header for CHIRPS datasets.

Returns:string containing config file header section.
start_date¶

Get and set start date of dataset.
